channel.title: 8thGen-PKZ || Spawn/Eco || PVM 7 PVP!
channel.description:
[B][CENTER][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=5]Welcome Everyone! Play Now: [url=http://8thgenpkz.weebly.com/]8thGenPkz - Home[/url][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER][SIZE=4]:lolbert::lolbert::que:8thGen-PKZ is a brand new server! We offer free item spawning for all players all just so you can head out to pvp and show who's boss! We have a wide range of items that you can spawn and some that require pkp to purchase! Don't worry though. It only takes afew decent kills before you can purchase amazing items! Please feel free to come and check out our site and be sure to join our community! *PS. We need players :)*[/SIZE]
What We Offer? [SIZE=3]-Flawless PVP -Wide range of PVM -Dicing -Skilling -IronMan Mode -Spawning -PKP System -Bossing -Nomad -Corp -Bork -24/7 Up-time -Weekly Updates -Woodcutting -Smithing -Mining -Curses -Barrage -Vengeance -Duel Arena! -Whip + DDS Duels! -Staking! -Nex Sets! -Claws! -Godswords -Chaotics -Herblore -Agility -Perfect Hybridding -Perfect Welfare! -Spirit Shields! -WORKING SLAYER! -Mystery Boxes! -Balanced Economy -Custom Titles -And much more!
-JOIN TODAY AND START YOUR LEGACY!-[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[SIZE=4]Please be aware that there is still Staff positions open.. But we will require at least a minimum of 15 players on before selecting someone to be apart of the 8thGen team. -Dr8thGen:penguin::penguin:[/SIZE]
[CENTER]Server Media: [img]http://s10.postimg.org/wmsrtaq3d/RSPS_1.png[/img] [img]http://s8.postimg.org/683t2d89h/RSPS_2.png[/img] [img]http://s24.postimg.org/4ffboljmt/RSPS_2.png[/img] [img]http://s22.postimg.org/oq8h7bnld/RSPS_2.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/fnoymeprv/RSPS_2.png[/img] [/CENTER]

item.description:
@zacktheskuxx wrote:

[CENTER][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=5]Welcome Everyone!
Play Now: 8thGenPkz - Home[/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][SIZE=4]:lolbert::lolbert::que:8thGen-PKZ is a brand new server! We offer free item spawning for all players all just so you can head out to pvp and show who’s boss!
We have a wide range of items that you can spawn and some that require pkp to purchase!
Don’t worry though. It only takes afew decent kills before you can purchase amazing items!
Please feel free to come and check out our site and be sure to join our community!
PS. We need players [/SIZE]

What We Offer?
[SIZE=3]-Flawless PVP
-Wide range of PVM
-Dicing
-Skilling
-IronMan Mode
-Spawning
-PKP System
-Bossing

-Corp

-Duel Arena!
-Whip + DDS Duels!
-Staking!

-Claws!

-Perfect Hybridding
-Perfect Welfare!
-Spirit Shields!
-WORKING SLAYER!
-Mystery Boxes!
-Balanced Economy
-Custom Titles
-And much more!

-JOIN TODAY AND START YOUR LEGACY!-[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=4]Please be aware that there is still Staff positions open… But we will require at least a minimum of 15 players on before selecting someone to be apart of the 8thGen team.
-Dr8thGen:penguin:[/SIZE]
